com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector

Class PossibleSentenceBoundary

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector.PossibleSentenceBoundary

  • public class PossibleSentenceBoundary
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PossibleSentenceBoundary(java.lang.CharSequence text, int index, TalismaneSession session)
      Build a possible sentence boundary for a given text, which means token sequences will be re-generated for each possible sentence boundary.
      PossibleSentenceBoundary(TokenSequence tokenSequence, int index)
      Build a possible sentence boundary from a token sequence, thus enabling us to re-use the same token sequence for multiple possible sentence boundaries.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getBoundaryString()
      The actual string being tested.
      int getIndex()
      The index of the possible boundary being tested.
      java.lang.CharSequence getText()
      The text englobing this possible boundary, where the end of the text is either the real end of the input stream, or at least n characters beyond the possible boundary.
      int getTokenIndexWithWhitespace()
      Index of this boundary's token, including whitespace.
      TokenSequence getTokenSequence()
      A token sequence representing the text.
      java.lang.String toString() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
